page.title: 12Burton "Statutes" Fair
page.content: The Fair is usually held in early October in the Market Place by St.Modwen's Church. When I walk across the (Ferry) bridge I can see the big wheel and it is good - we go up high. Then we go on the bumper cars and we crash into other cars and some crash into ours. It is best in the evening for all the lights are on. You can hear loud noises and music and people screaming. I always go and buy a coconut, I like the milk out of the coconut. I went where you pay 20p and get a ticket and open it, if it's an odd number you win an enormous Teddy, but I lost so I chose a small carrot. So you never lose at all! My brother, sister and me spent all our money so we went home.
